name: Shell Shark

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The shark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Water Breathing
text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The shark makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

description:
These impressive creatures, swimming through the sahuagin stronghold in The Final Enemy, are chosen by priestesses of Sekolah to serve as protectors and messengers. The sharks are blessed in a ritual during which plates of shell and coral are permanently affixed to their bodies.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 252
